title: POST api/v1/cables/{cableId} REQUEST
description: JSON document describing a new cable

length.description: length of the cable in meters

startConnectorId.description: Id of the connector attached to the start side of the cable

startConnectorColor.description: Name of the connector, e.g. housing or sleeve, attached to the start side of the cable

endConnectorId.description: Id of the connector attached to the end side of the cable

endConnectorColor.description: Name of the connector, e.g. housing or sleeve, attached to the end side of the cable
